description: This file defines a React component named ReviewScreen used for displaying a review interface of a document. It renders a preview of the transcript as HTML, overlays dynamic field data on a visual preview, and includes UI elements for editing or confirming the review process. The component makes use of imported service functions to generate HTML and overlays based on provided schema and data.

methods.name: labelFor(fields, key)
methods.description: Returns the label for a given field key within the specified fields array.

methods.name: formatValue(v)
methods.description: Formats a value for display, handling arrays and objects.

methods.name: getPath(obj, key)
methods.description: Retrieves a value from an object given a flat key.

methods.name: ReviewScreen({ data, templateSchema, transcriptText, onEdit, onConfirm })

ctags.name: ReviewScreen
ctags.pattern: /^export default function ReviewScreen({ data, templateSchema, transcriptText, onEdit, onConfirm }/
